data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Dijon.
Nantes's Mehdi Abeid misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nantes.
In the minute 2, Marcus Coco of Nantes gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Dijon at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Nantes pushes forward through Renaud Emond, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 10, Moses Simon (Nantes) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Dijon in the half of Nantes.
Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Can Dijon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nantes's half?
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 16, Antony Gautier signals a Nantes throw-in in Dijon's half.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Dijon needs to be cautious. Nantes have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 19, Antony Gautier awards Nantes a goal kick.
Nantes have been given a penalty at Stade de la Beaujoire...
Jonathan Panzo (Dijon) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 24, It's advantage Nantes in Nantes as Moses Simon scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
Nantes have a goal kick.
Antony Gautier awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dijon's Bersant Celina gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Nantes have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nantes.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Pedro Chirivella for Nantes has been booked by Antony Gautier and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 33, In Nantes, Dijon push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Antony Gautier signals a throw-in for Nantes, close to Dijon's area.
Free kick Dijon.
In the minute 40, Frederic Sammaritano (Dijon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Important block from the Nantes defence as Moussa Konate fires in a strike for Dijon.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Moussa Konate (Dijon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 45, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nantes.
Nantes push forward at Stade de la Beaujoire and Nicolas Pallois gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Dijon defence.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Nantes.
In the minute 45, Nantes's Sebastien Corchia gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 46, Dijon's Moussa Konate breaks free at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
Ludovic Blas (Nantes) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
Mounir Chouiar is on a sub for Eric Ebimbe for Dijon.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Dijon at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 52, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
Moussa Konate levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 54, That's a fine assist from Didier Ndong.
Frederic Sammaritano gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dijon.
Nantes have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 57, Antony Gautier awards Dijon a goal kick.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Free kick for Dijon in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 60, Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Nantes.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Randal Kolo Muani is replacing Mehdi Abeid for the home team.
Abdoul Kader Bamba is replacing Marcus Coco for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 64, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
The home team have replaced Renaud Emond with Abdoulaye Toure. This is the third substitution made today by Patrick Collot.
Dijon push upfield but Antony Gautier quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 65, Throw-in high up the field for Dijon in Nantes.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 68, In Nantes Nantes attack through Randal Kolo Muani. The finish is off target, however.
Dijon have a goal kick.
Dijon are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 69, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Nantes close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, In Nantes, Moussa Konate of Dijon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Nantes make their fourth substitution with Ludovic Blas replacing Pedro Chirivella.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Nantes.
The away team replace Moussa Konate with Mihai Dobre.
In the minute 77, Free kick Nantes.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Nantes Nantes drive forward through Moses Simon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 78, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Fabio (Nantes) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Andrei for Nantes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 78, Antony Gautier awards Dijon a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 81, Dijon push forward at Stade de la Beaujoire and Mihai Dobre gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nantes defence.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
Dijon drive upfield and Bersant Celina gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nantes defender.
In the minute 83, Dijon's Mihai Dobre gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nantes defender.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
Important block from the Nantes defence as Jordan Marie fires in a strike for Dijon.
In the minute 85, Dijon have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Linares is making the team's third substitution at Stade de la Beaujoire with Aurelien Scheidler replacing Frederic Sammaritano.
In the minute 88, In Nantes Nantes attack through Ludovic Blas. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Abdoul Kader Bamba for Nantes drives towards goal at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Throw-in Dijon.
In the minute 89, The home team replace Fabio with Dennis Appiah.
Dijon drive upfield and Ngonda Muzinga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nantes defender.
Dijon's Ngonda Muzinga gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Moses Simon (Nantes) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nantes.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
At Stade de la Beaujoire, Aurelien Scheidler has been yellow-carded for the away team.
